name: df-oadd
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(coa, cmpo(s0, s1, con0, con0, cfv(crdg(cmpt(s2, universe, csuc(cv(s2))), cv(s0)), cv(s1))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ +o =(s0 ∈ On, s1 ∈ On ↦(rec((s2 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ suc(s2)), s0)` s1))
comment: Define the ordinal addition operation. (Contributed by NM, 3-May-1995.)
